data.title: John Heard Biography
data.meta_description: Read all about John Heard with TV Guide's exclusive biography including their list of awards, celeb facts and more at TV Guide.
data.text:
Fast Facts

Got his start onstage in the '70s, appearing in plays on and off-Broadway

Won the Theatre World Award for his performance in the Vietnam drama G

R

Point (1977)

Made his feature-film debut with a lead role in 1977's Between the Lines

Won OBIE Awards for Best Performance for G

R

Point (1976-77), Othello and Split (both 1979-80)

Inducted into the Gonzaga College High School Theatre Hall of Fame in 2003

Was married to his first wife, Margot Kidder, for only six days
